Method Detail

clear

void clear()
Initializes the drawing model. Removes all entities; creates a default viewport, styles and layer. The method will fire a EVENT_CLEAR PropertyChangeEvent. No other events will be fired.

getNextID

int getNextID()
Determines the next free entity id.

Returns:
the next free entity id

reserveID

void reserveID(int id)
Marks an id as used.

Parameters:
id - the id to mark as used

getColor

java.awt.Color getColor()
Gets the current drawing model color to be used on addition of entities.

Returns:
current color

setColor

void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
Sets the current drawing model color. Fires a EVENT_COLOR PropertyChangeEvent.

Parameters:
color - the new current color to set

getThickness

float getThickness()
Gets the current line thickness to be used on addition of entities.

Returns:
current line thickness

setThickness

void setThickness(float thickness)
Sets the current line thickness. Fires a EVENT_THICKNESS PropertyChangeEvent.

Parameters:
thickness - current line thickness
